FinanceCommitteeMinutes.Location: Conference Room, NIT Transit House, New Delhi

MembersPresent.Name: Mr. Satpal Sharma
MembersPresent.Designation: Under Secretary, MHRD (Representative of JS & FA, IFD, MHRD)

MembersPresent.Name: Dr. Debasish Bhattacharya
MembersPresent.Designation: Member Secretary, Finance Committee and Registrar (I/C)

AgendaItems.Title: Confirmation of Minutes of 27th Meeting
AgendaItems.Details: Minutes of the 27th Finance Committee meeting held on December 05, 2015, were confirmed.

Details.Decision: Rules to be vetted by legal experts and forwarded to MHRD for approval.
Institute to request special grants from MHRD for 1500 capacity Boys Hostel (Rs. 80 Cr) and CPWD deposit works (Rs. 4.80 Cr).

AgendaItems.Title: Annual Budget 2016-17
AgendaItems.Details: Budget perused; priority projects should receive more funds. Special grants requests reiterated.

AgendaItems.Title: Financial Status as on June 29, 2016
AgendaItems.Details: Non-Plan unspent balance Rs. 3.62 Cr; Plan balance Rs. 6.7 Cr. Institute advised to request funds from MHRD to meet requirements.

AgendaItems.Title: Status of TEQIP-II Project
AgendaItems.Details: 97.19% of sanctioned amount utilized; achievements include 288 students funded, 5 students attended abroad, 13 patents filed, 19 workshops conducted. NPIU sanctioned an additional Rs. 10 Cr.

AgendaItems.Title: Physical and Financial Statement of ongoing projects
AgendaItems.Details: Some project remarks were incorrect; redrafted statement required. Only Water Treatment Plant, Upgradation of Internal Roads, and Lifts recommended for priority funding; other projects phased based on fund availability.

AgendaItems.Title: Outstanding statutory dues up to 31.03.2016
AgendaItems.Details: No outstanding statutory dues; Committee satisfied.

AgendaItems.Title: Proposal for Honorarium to Associate Deans
AgendaItems.Details: Special allowance Rs. 2500/month recommended, considering actual requirement. NIT Tiruchirappalli reference noted.

AgendaItems.Title: Proposal for Honorarium to Registrar (I/C)
AgendaItems.Details: Proposal not recommended, as FRSR allowances not applicable to autonomous bodies.

SubItems.Title: Annual maintenance of all buildings including Hostels & Quarters (2016-17)
EPF facilities to contractual employees
SubItems.Decision: Legal advice to be taken; proposal forwarded to Chairperson for consideration.

SubItems.Title: Minutes of 34th and 35th BWC meetings
SubItems.Decision: Confirmed minutes placed before 28th FC; recommended to BoG for approval.

FinanceCommitteeMinutes.Closure: Meeting ended with a vote of thanks to the Chair.
